title: Wear Watch Face: Color Pixel
summary: Millions of color combinations in various styles with Color Pixel Watch Face.
description: Customize your watch face with mezmerizing color pixels that dance in the background. This animated wallpaper features HD graphics, smooth animations and variable color pixel options for a look that's sure to leave you pleased. This custom watchface operates in the background so users can keep the full-functionality of their smartwatch including date, time and push notifications.Stand out from the crowd with a custom watch design. Download Color Pixel Watch Face today!Works for most round & square smartwatches including: Android WearMoto 360 ( moto360 )Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )Huawei WatchLG G Watch R ( lgwr )LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )Samsung Gear LiveAsus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )Fossil QTAG Heuer ConnectedMichael Kors AccessNixon The MissionPolar M600Tickwatchand more!When using Android Wear 2.0 on your smartwatch, you will find the watch face by entering the Google Play Store on your watch and navigating down until you see a list of apps installed on your phone.Osthoro is delivering some of the best smartwatch wallpapers available today. Find other unique live wallpapers for your smartwatch by visiting www.osthoro.com today.
descriptionHTML:
Customize your watch face with mezmerizing color pixels that dance in the background. This animated wallpaper features HD graphics, smooth animations and variable color pixel options for a look that's sure to leave you pleased. This custom watchface operates in the background so users can keep the full-functionality of their smartwatch including date, time and push notifications.
Stand out from the crowd with a custom watch design. Download Color Pixel Watch Face today!

Works for most round & square smartwatches including:
Android Wear
Moto 360 ( moto360 )
Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )
Huawei Watch
LG G Watch R ( lgwr )
LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )
LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )
Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )
Samsung Gear Live
Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )
Fossil Q
TAG Heuer Connected
Michael Kors Access
Nixon The Mission
Polar M600
Tickwatch
and more!

When using Android Wear 2.0 on your smartwatch, you will find the watch face by entering the Google Play Store on your watch and navigating down until you see a list of apps installed on your phone.

Osthoro is delivering some of the best smartwatch wallpapers available today. Find other unique live wallpapers for your smartwatch by visiting www.osthoro.com today.
comments: Like ads? This is for you!
